titles.title: To designate the Federal building located at 300 Recinto Sur Street in Old San Juan, Puerto Rico, as the "Jose V. Toledo United States Post Office and Courthouse".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Economic Development.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 2/25/1998--Introduced. Designates the Federal building located at 300 Recinto Sur Street in Old San Juan, Puerto Rico, as the Jose V. Toledo United States Post Office and Courthouse.
